item.title: How can I recover my bitcoin wallet from a cellphone?
item.description:
How can I recover my bitcoin wallet from a cellphone?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required. Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top I had the Bitcoin app on my old Samsung handset and that handset completely crashed on me with no way to repair it.

item.title: What is your view on cryptocurrencies and other blockchain tech like Ethereum?
item.description:
What is your view on cryptocurrencies and other blockchain tech like Ethereum?

Answer (1 of 2): Large corporations and big banks are beginning to understand the power of public blockchains. item.title: Bitcoin on Wheels: How We Took Part in European Bitcoin Tour
item.description:
Bitcoin on Wheels: How We Took Part in European Bitcoin Tour

Strictly speaking, we just provided our moral and financial support to it. The members of the expedition, held this year from February 26 to March 8, were journalists of the "Govorit i Pokazyvaet" production studio and BitNovosti web-site, who paid all their travel expenses only with cryptocurrency.

item.title: Decentralized, Transparent, Blockchain-Based Governance
item.description:
Decentralized, Transparent, Blockchain-Based Governance

Everyone in the crypto world has been talking about the "Civil War," and not the one involving Captain America and Iron Man. No, the civil war they are referring to is the Bitcoin civil war, a rancorous year-long battle for control centered on scalability.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Perfect Trend Line Support Bounce - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Perfect Trend Line Support Bounce - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price traded above the $11.00 handle vs the USD, and it looks like there are more upsides left in ETH/USD in the near term. Ethereum price traded above the $11.00 handle vs the USD, and it looks like there are more upsides left in ETH/USD in the near term.

item.title: OKCoin is Experimenting With Ethereum Trading In Their Platform
item.description:
OKCoin is Experimenting With Ethereum Trading In Their Platform

Rumours sparked yesterday about a possible inclusion of Ethereum Trading on OKCoin's Assets Exchange, the website was showing signs of integration with Ether trading, but they removed these changes, and OKCoin issued a short statement denying the inclusion of the Cryptocurrency.

item.title: New Blockchain Initiative Bitland Puts Land on Ledger in Ghana
item.description:
New Blockchain Initiative Bitland Puts Land on Ledger in Ghana

Press Release: New blockchain-based initiative in Africa Bitland aims to stamp out corruption and free up trillions of dollars in locked capital for infrastructure development. May 16, 2016 - Blockchain technology is extremely powerful, offering huge advantages of cost, transparency and reliability thanks to the immutable nature of decentralised ledgers.

item.title: BitHope Foundation Partners With Counterparty For HOPECOIN Token
item.description:
BitHope Foundation Partners With Counterparty For HOPECOIN Token

The BitHope Foundation has partnered with Counterparty, which means the charitable organisation has created their token. HOPECOIN, as this token is called, will be sent to anyone who makes a donation through the IndieSquare button.

item.title: CEX.io Surpasses US$40m in Payment Card Deposits
item.description:
CEX.io Surpasses US$40m in Payment Card Deposits

CEX.io remains one of the world's best-known Bitcoin exchanges, and they have surpassed the US$40m mark in deposits through Visa and MasterCard. This is quite a significant milestone for the company, as it goes to show consumers want to use convenient payment methods to buy Bitcoin.

item.title: How can Bitcoin be the Perfect Tool for Online Gambling? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
How can Bitcoin be the Perfect Tool for Online Gambling? - NEWSBTC

Since the beginning of the Internet, the gambling industry has always been an adopter of all new online technologies that have been coming around.
